DOC.brief_title: Botox Cosmetic Young Patient With Glabellar Furrows
DOC.criteria: Female Fitzpatrick Skin Types IIII Between 30 50 year age At least moderate severity maximum frown Prior botulinum toxin treatment Any disorder ( myasthenia gravis , EatonLambert syndrome ) agent ( aminoglycoside antibiotic ) might interfere neuromuscular function Any condition situation might put subject significant risk , confound study result ( significant preexisting brow eyelid ptosis ) Allergy sensitivity study component Participation another clinical study within 30 day study start date Are plan facial cosmetic procedure study period , pregnant , breastfeeding , plan pregnancy study .
DOC.keyword: Glabellar line moderate severity maximum frown
